name: ctool
description: 程序开发常用工具 chrome / edge / firefox / utools / windows / linux / mac
author: baiy

scripts.initialize: pnpm -r --filter 'ctool-config' run build && pnpm -r --filter 'ctool-adapter-base' run build && pnpm -r adapter-build
scripts.dev: pnpm run initialize && pnpm -r --filter 'ctool-core' run dev
scripts.build: pnpm run initialize && pnpm -r --filter 'ctool-core' run build
scripts.release: node release.js && pnpm run build && pnpm -r platform-release
